docs.lead_paragraph: Utah's abortion rate has dropped to the lowest level ever recorded, and there are differing opinions as to why.

headline.main: Utah's Abortion Rate Drops to Lowest Level Ever Recorded

headline.main: Before the Chinese Year of the Sheep, a Bulge in Births

docs.abstract: Parts of China have seen full maternity wards, as parents try to take advantage of the auspicious Year of the Horse and avoid giving birth in the less fortuitous Year of the Sheep.
docs.snippet: Parts of China have seen full maternity wards, as parents try to take advantage of the auspicious Year of the Horse and avoid giving birth in the less fortuitous Year of the Sheep.

docs.lead_paragraph: Readers react to an editorial about a British study showing that uncomplicated pregnancies are best handled by midwives.

docs.lead_paragraph: A woman who was 15 weeks pregnant when she was declared dead at a Dublin hospital is removed from life support after judges said that the fetus had little chance of survival.

headline.main: Irish Court Lets Woman Be Taken Off Life Support
headline.print_headline: Irish Court Lets Woman Be Taken Off Life Support

docs.abstract: Dublin High Court panel rules life support may be turned off for clinically dead pregnant woman, saying it is in best interest of her fetus.
docs.snippet: A woman who was 15 weeks pregnant when she was declared dead at a Dublin hospital is removed from life support after judges said that the fetus had little chance of survival.

docs.lead_paragraph: A brain-dead pregnant woman was taken off life support Friday after a court ruled that her 18-week-old fetus was doomed to die — a case that exposed fear and confusion among doctors over how to apply Ireland's strict ban on abortion in an age of medical innovation.

headline.main: Pregnant Woman Taken Off Life Support in Ireland

docs.abstract: Are young people being smart by delaying the rituals of adult life, or are they being irresponsible?
docs.snippet: Are young people being smart by delaying the rituals of adult life, or are they being irresponsible?

docs.lead_paragraph: Doctors said the patient, in her late 20s, was declared clinically dead Dec. 3 after wounding her head in a fall on Nov. 29.

headline.main: Ireland: Doctors Seek to Remove Pregnant Woman From Life Support
headline.print_headline: Ireland: Doctors Seek to Remove Pregnant Woman From Life Support

docs.abstract: Dublin High Court hears testimony in case of brain-dead woman who has been kept on life support to save her 17-week-old fetus; case has fueled debate about Ireland's abortion laws; seven doctors plead for permission to turn off machines as treatment cannot end in successful birth.
docs.snippet: Doctors said the patient, in her late 20s, was declared clinically dead Dec. 3 after wounding her head in a fall on Nov. 29.

docs.lead_paragraph: A South Carolina mother who drove her children into the Atlantic Ocean during what doctors determined was a psychotic break was committed on Tuesday to a Florida state mental hospital, authorities said.

headline.main: Woman Who Drove Kids Into Ocean Committed to Florida Mental Hospital
headline.print_headline: Woman Who Drove Kids Into Ocean Committed to Florida Mental Hospital

docs.snippet: A South Carolina mother who drove her children into the Atlantic Ocean during what doctors determined was a psychotic break was committed on Tuesday to a Florida state mental hospital, authorities said.

docs.abstract: Questions about where to put hyphens may seem trivial, even pedantic. But small errors can distract readers who should be focused on the substance of our reporting.
